short_description: bean and boy is a cleaning equipment supplier based in westcliff-on-sea, united kingdom.
long_description: bean and boy is a family-run business making soap by hand in southend-on-sea, uk. since then we've had our soap recipes certified and we have introduced new combinations specifically targeted at problematic skin and household application. our soaps are available through all of our amazing stockists across europe, and are also available to buy online via our etsy store. we've grown out of our kitchen and now make soap in our little workshop on a nearby farm, but we still ensure that each batch is carefully made by hand using the traditional cold process method and the finest natural ingredients. inspired by bean's sensitive skin and developing eczema, we worked on creating our own soap range that we're proud to call "family soap". there's something for everyone, and each recipe has been thoroughly tested in our own home. create98: we are teaching soapmaking at create98 in leigh-on-sea on.
business_tags: natural handmade soap | handmade soaps | natural bar soaps | oils & butters | sensitive skin | charcoal soap | exfoliating soap | essential oils | natural soaps | plant based | botanicals | making soap | essential oil blend | natural ingredients | soap making | safety advice | eczema | stockists & wholesale
generated_description: bean and boy, legally known as bean and boy ltd., is a family-run business based in westcliff-on-sea, england, specializing in the handmade production of natural, vegan soaps. the company was founded after the owners discovered that commercially-produced soaps exacerbated their daughter's eczema. employs traditional cold process methods and uses high-quality, natural ingredients without preservatives, colorants, or fragrances. their soap recipes are certified and targeted at sensitive and problematic skin, and are available both online and in-store. the company also offers soapmaking workshops.
